name: Pollen Nation
description:
Get as many flowers pollenated as you can! Get bees to follow you and avoid the birds.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

WASD or ARROW KEYS to move

Touch to interact with bees and flowers

Hold SPACE BAR to get the bees in formation

Get as many flowers before time runs out.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for the Mini Jam 36: Nature in 3 days with the limitation being a 3 color palatte.
